About me

Hello, I'm Rakshan. I am a recent graduate with a Bachelor's Degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering from VIT-AP, Amaravati. My expertise lies in Full-stack Web Development and Application Development, and I'm passionate about expanding my knowledge in Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain Technology, and Application Development. I am currently seeking full-time or contract-based opportunities where I can apply my skills, contribute to impactful projects, and continue to grow as a developer. Thanks!
